definitions.definition: A person with extensive knowledge or ability in a given subject.
examples: If an expert says it can't be done, get another expert . - David Ben-Gurion
We called in several experts on the subject, but they couldn't reach an agreement.

definitions.definition: A player ranking just below master .

main_definition: A person with extensive knowledge or ability in a given subject.
secondary_definitions: ( chess ) A player ranking just below master .
